author: IGN
description: Watch the Mistfall Hunter Beta 3 gameplay trailer for another look at this dark fantasy action extraction RPG. In Mistfall Hunter, you and up to three fellow Gyldhunters venture into the Gyldenmist to face monstrous foes and rival teams, fighting to return with valuable goods and powerful gear. The third beta for Mistfall Hunter is available now. Step into the Fortress, uncover the fanatic wrath of a new path for the Seer class - Blasphemer, explore the camp, and piece together the story behind the Mistfall.
title: Mistfall Hunter - Official BETA 3 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
The Rainbow Vomit Shotgun is one of the most unique Jakobs Legendary weapons in Borderlands 4, blasting out rainbow-colored projectiles with every shot. In this guide, we’ll show you how to unlock and farm the Rainbow Vomit, step by step.

For more Borderlands 4 tips and tricks, check out our Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/borderlands-4
title: Borderlands 4: How to Get the Rainbow Vomit Shotgun (Legendary Farm Guide)

author: IGN
description: Official Jurassic World dinosaurs can now roam in Minecraft worlds. Watch the Minecraft x Jurassic World trailer to see what to expect with the Jurassic World add-on. In this Jurassic World add-on, build your outpost and set out to find and preserve every dinosaur species. Subdue wild dinosaurs and transport them into high-tech enclosures to extract DNA, observe their behavior, and breed them to prevent their extinction. The Jurassic World add-on also includes the latest Jurassic World Rebirth dinosaurs.
title: Minecraft x Jurassic World - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description: A strange twist of fate brings Cheelai and Broly to Conton City! Ready to live the Time Patroller life by their side? Watch the latest Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 trailer for a peek at what to expect with the upcoming Future Saga Chapter 3 DLC. Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2's Future Saga Chapter 3 DLC will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Nintendo Switch, Xbox, and Steam.
title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 - Official Future Saga Chapter 3 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
You are a handyman renovating a massive research facility abandoned after a mysterious incident. Watch The Lift announcement trailer for this upcoming eerie first-person simulator, featuring house-flipping gameplay and an interactive world inspired by Soviet sci-fi and SCP Foundation. The Lift announcement trailer also gives us a glimpse at gameplay. The Lift will be available on PC in 2026, and a playtest sign-up is available now on Steam.

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Lift - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In an exclusive interview, the developers of Nioh 3 at Team Ninja go into detail about the new Ninja Style combat system.

#IGN #Nioh3
title: How Nioh 3 is Changing the Game with Ninja Style and the Distinctive Mist System – IGN First

author: IGN
description: Watch the 2025 Gameplay Trailer for EVE Vanguard, a multiplayer sci-fi sandbox shooter developed by CCP. Players will enter a persistent world within an expansive galaxy to take on high-roller challenges on dangerous planets. A new public playtest called Operation Nemesis is underway, offering players new weapons, combat with diverse enemies, and the chance to take on narrative-driven missions. Operation Nemesis is available now through October 2 for PC, with the game set to launch in 2026.
title: EVE Vanguard - Official 2025 Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Launch Trailer for Alien: Rogue Incursion - Part One: Evolved Edition, an action survival first-person shooter developed by Survios. Players will take up arms and embody a lone Colonial Marine on a mission to take down the strongest of the Xenomorphs by any means necessary. Make use of shotguns, assault rifles, and more to defeat the Hive in Alien: Rogue Incursion - Part One: Evolved Edition, launching on September 30 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Alien: Rogue Incursion - Part One: Evolved Edition - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Get a look at the 'Drop In' Live Action Early Access Launch Trailer for Skate, an upcoming free-to-play open-world installment to the skateboarding franchise developed by Full Circle. Get a glimpse in the life of a skater with Kiki, Jackie, Alfie, and Brayan as they skate across San Vansterdam with a retro skating video style. Interact with the easy-to-use Flick-It controls, physics-based movement system, and more in Skate, available now in Early Access for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Skate - Official 'Drop In' Live Action Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Ashes of Damned Cinematic Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the next installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players will join iconic characters from the Zombies franchise, including Grigori Weaver, Elizabeth Grey, Mackenzie “Mac” Carver, and Maya Aguinaldo, alongside a version of the original crew comprising of Edward Richtofen, Tank Dempsey, Nikolai Belinski, and Takeo Masaki, upon arrival in the Dark Aether. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 launches on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official Ashes of Damned Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Cyberpunk 2077 Trauma Team Trailer for Arena Breakout: Infinite, a free-to-play tactical extraction shooter developed by Morefun Studios. Players will soon gain access to a Cyberpunk Trauma Team Military Supply cosmetic pack to dispatch enemy combatants in style. The Cyberpunk 2077 Trauma Team Military Supply cosmetic pack for Arena Breakout: Infinite is launching on September 17 for PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Arena Breakout: Infinite x Cyberpunk 2077 - Official Trauma Team Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Teaser Trailer for Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies, an animated horror installment to the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. This series re-contextualizes the Marvel Universe as Earth's mightiest heroes go head-to-head against a zombie outbreak, turning even the strongest of them into undead nightmares. Marvel Animation’s Marvel Zombies will be a four-part event on September 24, streaming exclusively on Disney+.

After the Avengers are overtaken by a zombie plague, a desperate group of survivors discover the key to bringing an end to the super-powered undead, racing across a dystopian landscape and risking life and limb to save their world. 
 
Marvel Zombies stars Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Rudd, Florence Pugh, David Harbour, Tessa Thompson, Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Hailee Steinfeld, Wyatt Russell, Randall Park, Iman Vellani, Dominique Thorne, and more. The series is executive produced by Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Brad Winderbaum, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt,
title: Marvel Animation's Marvel Zombies - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Rudd

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the PlayStation Announcement Trailer for Valheim, an open-world survival crafting game developed by Iron Gate AB. Players will build and fight in the name of survival in a procedurally-generated afterlife based on Viking tradition. Set up a base of operations to defeat the forces of the tenth world in Valheim, coming in 2026 to PlayStation 5 (PS5), with the game being available now for Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Valheim #Gaming #IGN
title: Valheim - Official PlayStation Announcement Trailer (ft. Neil Newbon)

author: IGN
description:
Meet the Megaladon in this latest Jurassic World Evolution 3 trailer for the upcoming management sim game. Check it out to learn about this apex predator of the prehistoric oceans, now reborn in your park's Lagoon. Jurassic World Evolution 3 will be available on PC, PlayStation 5 (PS5), and Xbox Series X/S on October 21, 2025.

#JurassicWorldEvolution3 #Gaming #IGN
title: Jurassic World Evolution 3 - Official Megalodon Dinosaur Showcase Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Echoes of Bloodborne can be found throughout Hollow Knight: Silksong, from its opening level to its secret endings.

Team Cherry’s long-awaited follow-up to 2017’s Hollow Knight not only resembles FromSoftware’s gothic horror masterpiece in theming and visuals, but also in the way it shakes up gameplay mechanics introduced by its predecessor. By giving players control of a more agile character, and tweaking combat to favor bolder, more aggressive playstyles, Silksong builds on Hollow Knight in much the same way that Bloodborne built on Dark Souls, perfecting a blueprint its developers have stuck to ever since.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Silksong Gives Hollow Knight the Bloodborne Treatment

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Wreckreation, an open-world arcade racing creation game developed by Three Fields Entertainment. Players will create, race, and wreck on 155 square miles of sandbox alone or with friends in co-op. Explore the open world with over 50 cars to choose from, with the ability to build highways, design loops, ramps, jumps, and more. Wreckreation is launching on October 28 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Wreckreation #Gaming #IGN
title: Wreckreation - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'One Thousand Blades' Trailer for Ghost of Yotei, an action-adventure sequel to the hit Ghost of Tsushima developed by Sucker Punch Productions. Players embark on a quest for revenge as Atsu hunts the Yotei Six one by one across 1600s rural Japan. Explore lush landscapes, make use of an array of new weapons, and become a Ghost once more. Ghost of Yotei is launching on October 2 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#GhostOfYotei #Gaming #IGN
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official 'One Thousand Blades' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this first-ever adaptation of the acclaimed stealth video game Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell, legendary agent Sam Fisher (voiced by Liev Schreiber) is drawn back into the field when a wounded young operative seeks out his help. 

Produced by Ubisoft, in partnership with Derek Kolstad (John Wick), Sun Creature and Fost. 

Splinter Cell: Deathwatch launches on Netflix on October 14, 2025 at 12:00 AM PDT.

#IGN #Gaming #Netflix
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch Exclusive Trailer (2025) Liev Schreiber, Kirby

author: IGN
description:
Check out 'The Story So Far' Trailer for Dying Light: The Beast, an upcoming first-person parkour action zombie game developed by Techland. Players will get the rundown on the events before Dying Light: The Beast as Kyle Crane. Revisit his past as he recollects events long since transpired before embarking on his journey forward for revenge. Dying Light: The Beast is launching on September 18 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#DyingLightTheBeast #Gaming #IGN
title: Dying Light: The Beast - Official 'The Story So Far' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join the communications director/publishing manager at developer Pocketpair for an update on Palworld, including the plans for the version 1.0 launch and the forthcoming winter update for the online co-op multiplayer open-world survival crafting RPG. The video also dives into Pocketpair's future, including the role of Pocketpair Publishing.

#Palworld #Gaming #IGN
title: Palworld - Official Version 1.0, Pocketpair and The Future Update Video

author: IGN
description: Dispatch, the upcoming workplace superhero comedy adventure game with a strategy layer from a group of ex-Telltale developers, is coming to PC and PS5 on October 22. Dispatch stars Aaron Paul and Jeffrey Wright and is developed by AdHoc, a new studio comprised of a number of former Telltale developers. It will be released episodically over the course of four weeks, with two episodes dropping each week starting on October 22. It's priced at $30 for the full season, or $40 for deluxe version of the full season that includes a digital artbook and four digital comics. Wishlist it and/or check out the playable demo right now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2592160/Dispatch/
title: Dispatch - Official PC and PS5 Release Date Trailer (ft. Aaron Paul, Jeffrey Wright)

author: IGN
description:
Learn more about the gameplay in the first-person puzzle adventure game The Lift as Fantastic Signals Studio Director Ivan Slovtsov shows you more about playing as a handyman renovating The Institute, a gigantic research facility that was abandoned after a mysterious incident. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3283240

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Lift - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Assassin's Creed Shadows: Claws of Awaji reviewed on PC by Jarrett Green. Also available on Xbox Series X/S and PlayStation 5.

"Assassin's Creed Shadows brought some much needed promise and energy that the series was lacking, and the Claws of Awaji expansion doesn’t really move that needle much in either direction. Its forgettable story and lack of new interesting side distractions don’t detract from how fun it is to ride through the tumultuous badlands of the region using brute force and subterfuge to take down yet another dark cabal of evil doers. But it doesn’t make the strong case for the necessity of any more epilogues, either."
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Claws of Awaji DLC Video Review

author: IGN
description: Watch the Claws of Awaji DLC Launch Trailer for Assassin's Creed Shadows, a DLC to the hit action-adventure open-world game developed by Ubisoft. Players will join Naoe and Yasuke on a journey to the cryptic island of Awaji in search of lost treasure. Face off against the Ippa clan to unlock new skills, gear, outfits, and more. The Claws of Awaji DLC for Assassin's Creed is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Official Claws of Awaji DLC Launch Trailer
